name: Shopping with Virus
description:
You want to help the nice old lady from the neighborhood. She needs toilet paper from the store. But oh no - Corona is trying to kill you, so jump, collect toilet paper and deliver it to the old lady without getting infected.


This is our entry for the #1 Stay Safe! Jam.

Controls:

Keyboard: Left & Right Arrows or A & D to run, Space for jump

Credits:
https://www.staysafejam.org/ for their logo
@pietze art and audio
@teemitzitrone code
@progsource code and audio

GitHub: https://github.com/progsource/ssj2020_1
